ValidationRule.description: For a Cat or Kitten - If an FIV / FeLV test has been done, the Date the test was Administered must be added.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Type__c, "Cat"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Type__c, "Kitten") ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(aos_FIV_FeLV_Test_Outcome__c))), ISBLANK(aos_FIV_Date_Administered__c), aos_Is_New__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If an FIV/FeLV test has been done, the date the test was administered must be added.
